description: Quantum Machine Learning knowledge graph covering variational circuits, optimization, and quantum advantage

nodes.name: Parameter Shift Rule
nodes.description: Method for computing exact gradients of quantum circuits by shifting rotation angles by +/- pi/2
challenge_hooks: Why exactly pi/2 shift? Derive from eigenvalue spectrum
When does PSR fail vs finite differences?
Cost scaling: how many circuit evaluations per gradient?

nodes.name: Barren Plateaus
nodes.description: Phenomenon where gradient variance vanishes exponentially with circuit depth/width, making optimization infeasible
challenge_hooks: How does circuit depth affect gradient variance?

nodes.name: Variational Quantum Circuits
nodes.description: Parameterized quantum circuits optimized classically, foundation of VQE/QAOA/QML
challenge_hooks: Design choices: depth vs width vs connectivity
What makes a good ansatz for a given problem?

nodes.name: Data Encoding
nodes.description: Methods for encoding classical data into quantum states: amplitude, angle, IQP, data re-uploading
challenge_hooks: Amplitude vs angle encoding: expressiveness tradeoffs
Data re-uploading: why interleave encoding and processing?

nodes.name: Quantum Kernels
nodes.description: Using quantum circuits to compute kernel functions, connecting to classical kernel methods
challenge_hooks: Fidelity kernel: inner product in Hilbert space
When can classical kernels match quantum?
Projected quantum kernels and their benefits

nodes.name: Entanglement Structure
nodes.description: Role of entanglement patterns in circuit expressibility and trainability
challenge_hooks: How does entanglement depth affect expressibility?
Connection between entanglement and barren plateaus
Efficient classical simulation of low-entanglement circuits

nodes.name: Variational Quantum Eigensolver
nodes.description: Hybrid algorithm for finding ground states of Hamiltonians using variational optimization
challenge_hooks: Classical optimizer choice and its impact

nodes.name: QAOA
nodes.description: Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm for combinatorial optimization

nodes.name: Shot Noise
nodes.description: Statistical uncertainty from finite measurement samples affecting gradient estimation
challenge_hooks: Optimal number of shots for gradient descent

nodes.name: Quantum Natural Gradient
nodes.description: Second-order optimization using quantum Fisher information matrix

nodes.name: Circuit Expressibility
nodes.description: Ability of a parameterized circuit to explore the unitary or state space

nodes.name: Classical Simulation Limits
nodes.description: Boundaries of efficient classical simulation: tensor networks, stabilizer formalism, low entanglement

nodes.name: Quantum Advantage
nodes.description: Demonstrating computational speedup over best known classical algorithms

nodes.name: Error Mitigation
nodes.description: Techniques to reduce noise effects without full error correction: ZNE, PEC, DD
